thread.title: Colleen & Adam: We Were Honest from the Beginning
thread.title_full: Colleen & Adam: We Were Honest from the Beginning

author: matchuptodate
title: Colleen & Adam: We Were Honest from the Beginning
text:
Colleen & Adam: We Were Honest from the Beginning January 23, 2017 
Colleen & Adam’s #MatchMade story as told by Colleen: 
I was on Match for a few months with no luck. Then I came across Adam’s picture, I knew I had to reach out to him hoping that he would return the message. I was so excited when I found out that I had a message in my inbox from him. 
We exchanged many messages back and forth for a week straight before we ever met. We put everything out on the table in the messages. Me having a son and him having a prior failed engagement. 
After all of the back and forth messages and phone calls we decided to finally meet. It was the best decision that we could have made. 
Two years later we were engaged and then married in October 2016. We are now ready to start this journey that is ahead of us!
